meanings.definition: Plural noun: Fish that live in caves.
meanings.sent1: The cavefishes swam in the dark underground waters.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the unique adaptations of cavefishes to their dark habitats.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous explorer marveled at the mysterious beauty of the cavefishes.
meanings.sent4: In the depths of the cave, the cavefishes seemed like elusive spirits.
meanings.sent5: The pale, eyeless cavefishes were a fascinating subject for research.

meanings.definition: Verb: To explore caves in search of fish.
meanings.sent1: We decided to cavefishes in the uncharted caverns of the mountain.
meanings.sent2: The team planned to cavefishes in the limestone caves next weekend.
meanings.sent3: After hours of cavefishing, we finally caught a glimpse of a rare cavefish.
meanings.sent4: The thrill of cavefishing for hidden treasures in the dark was exhilarating.
meanings.sent5: Explorers often cavefishes to discover new species in remote underground rivers.
